subdisciplines.name: Acting Techniques
subdisciplines.description: The study and practice of various techniques used in acting such as the Stanislavski System, Meisner Technique, and Method acting.

subdisciplines.name: Physical Theatre
subdisciplines.description: A form of theatre where physical movement and gesture are the primary means of storytelling and communication.

subdisciplines.name: Voice and Speech
subdisciplines.description: The study and practice of vocal techniques such as diction, projection, and intonation used in acting and public speaking.

subdisciplines.name: Dramatic Literature
subdisciplines.description: The study and appreciation of the written works intended to be performed, including plays and screenplays.
